faq1_q_1: Why choose Wix ahead of wordpress?
faq1_a_1: Well Wix is best if you want to run your website and having little experience in website development you can easily customize and optimize on the other hand WordPress is more complicated for all non-technical person.
faq2_q_1: Any restrictions in Wix?
faq2_a_1: Wix is meant to be as simple as possible so that the people with 0 to None knowledge of programming can easily manage their own Website. So yes there are few restrictions on Wix platform, like Custom Php and databases, multi-vendor affiliate stores and real-estate listings.
faq3_q_1: What will you need from me to get started with the Wix website?
faq3_a_1: I need your login credentials to wix account with all necessary information for the task.
faq4_q_1: Do I offer SEO services?
faq4_a_1: Yes I do provide SEO services but it will cost extra.

Yes! My job is to help you with your website, so I will be there to help you when you need it.

title_1: I will create a website using drupal or wordpress
description_content 1: I will build a basic website in Drupal or Wordpress. A basic website is one that has the most common features: 1) Pages: you'll be able to edit existing pages with a wysiwyg editor. You can add images, videos and change the text. 2) Blog: I can add a blog where you can add as many posts and you want. You'll have a wysiwyg editor fo customise the content in a similar way as pages. Blog posts can have social buttons at the bottom, so people can share them in social networks. 3) Contact page: a page with a contact form that will send the information to your e-mail. 4) Responsive design, so it looks good in desktop, tablets and phones. This is what I'll need from you: 1) Details about how many pages you need in the website. 2) Whether you need or not a blog. 3) I'll send you a list of free themes (you can send me paid ones if you want) and you will choose which one to use. I'll add your logo and change colours if you want, but more advanced changes have to be purchased separately. faq2_q_1: Why is it vital to have a Responsive Website? What are the Benefits?
faq2_a_1: Responsive web design can improve the user experience which will translate into a positive perception of your brand & business. It will make your site mobile-friendly, improve the way it looks on devices with both large and small screens, and help you improve your rankings in search engines as well.
